location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that the Resident has granted a set of bills (No 11) in favour of Messrs Ritchie Stewart & Company in order to meet the demands of the Bushire Residency.
